articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: America's chaotic new reality over abortion takes shape
articles.description: After the celebration and grief comes the chaos of a nation split by bitter political divides that now determine where women can access abortion.

articles.author: Hannah Sarisohn and Alaa Elassar, CNN
articles.title: Five people were injured in a shooting at a Texas trail ride gathering
articles.description: Five people were injured after being shot at a trail ride concert organized by a Texas motorcycle club early Sunday.

articles.description: CNN's Jim Acosta talks to "The Daily Show with Trevor Noah" contributor Jordan Klepper about the MAGA rally he attended in Mississippi where Klepper talked to Trump supporters about Jan. 6 and the Congressional hearing.

articles.title: Live updates: Roe v. Wade decision and abortion rights news
